practice_phrases: I don't mind
我不介意
I don't mind it
我不介意它
I don't mind what you want
我不介意你想要什么
I don't mind what you tell me
我不介意你告诉我什么
I don't mind where to meet
我不介意在哪里见面
I don't mind what would happen
我不介意会发生的事
You can tell me, I don't mind
你能告诉我，我不介意
I don't mind what you wanted to say
我不介意你想要说什么
I don't mind meeting on Saturday night
我不介意在星期六晚上见面
If you can't finish soon, I don't mind
如果你不能很快完成，我不介意
A few minutes
几分钟
I don't mind a few minutes
我不介意几分钟
You can finish in a few minutes
你能在几分钟完成
She saw me a few minutes ago
她几分钟前看到我
I hope you'll finish in a few minutes
我希望你在几分钟完成
I don't mind what happens in a few minutes
我不介意几分钟后会发生什么
You can tell me in a few minutes
你能在几分钟告诉我
I don't mind if it takes a few minutes
如果它需要几分钟，我不介意
She said she would finish in a few minutes
她说她会在几分钟完成
I hope you can tell me what you want in a few minutes
我希望你能在几分钟告诉我你想要什么
Wait for a few minutes
等几分钟
I don't mind waiting for a few minutes
我不介意等几分钟
You can wait for a few minutes
你能等几分钟
I hope you can wait for a few minutes
我希望你能等几分钟
She said she would wait for a few minutes
她说她会等几分钟
I don't mind if you wait for a few minutes
如果你等几分钟，我不介意
Can you tell me if you can wait for a few minutes
你能告诉我你能不能等几分钟吗
I hope you don't mind waiting for a few minutes
我希望你不介意等几分钟
She saw me waiting for a few minutes and she was very kind
当她看到我等几分钟时，她非常友好
I don't mind waiting for a few minutes if you can't finish soon
如果你不能很快完成，我不介意等几分钟
Tomorrow morning
明天早上
I don't mind tomorrow morning
我不介意明天早上
Can you tell me tomorrow morning
你能明天早上告诉我吗
I hope you can finish tomorrow morning
我希望你明天早上能完成
We will meet tomorrow morning on Saturday
我们明天早上星期六见面

如果你想，我不介意明天早上等
You can tell me what you want tomorrow morning
你明天早上能告诉我你想要什么
